room_title: Escape room "Mummy Tomb" by The Wreck Room Escape Game in Denver
room_description: An old friend has contacted you out of the blue and is rambling on about an ancient Egyptian tomb and the scepter of immortality. He does not go into too much detail but he seems to be in trouble and you are the only person he can trust. He says there are bad people after him and he fears he will not be able to complete his mission. Can you and your team finish what he started and keep the scepter from falling into the wrong hands?
